alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; Inland St. Johns; Northern Columbia; South Central Duval; Southern Columbia; Trout River; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, northeastern Bradford, west central St. Johns, Baker, Union, Clay, southeastern Columbia, western Duval and south central Charlton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylor to Olustee to near Palestine Community. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Starke, Lake Butler, Raiford, Jacksonville International Arpt, Middleburg, Taylor, Macclenny and Glen St. Mary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
